law.catch_line: Failure to maintain register of metals and objects containing metal -- Penalty.

text.section: A person guilty of failure to maintain a register of metals and objects containing metal shall be fined not more than one hundred dollars ($100) or be imprisoned in the county jail for not more than thirty (30) days, or both.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008.
